price: 63. Did we take them as an object of mockery, or have (our) eyes failed to perceive them?"
arabic: أَتَّخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا أَمۡ زَاغَتۡ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: attakhadhnāhum sikh'riyyan am zāghat ʿanhumu al-abṣāru
